content: Imagine you are James Bond. In his style, write a voicemail message informing M that you will be late for the mission briefing.

[Deep, smooth voice] "M, it's 007. I'm afraid I'll be a bit delayed for the briefing. Seems I've got a... unexpected engagement to attend to. Nothing to worry about, just a little detour that might prove useful. I'll make sure to catch up with you as soon as I can. Keep the martini's chilled, won't you? Bond out."
